name: iAssistant Followers Analysis for Instagram
description: An assistant for you. Professional followers analysis for Instagram.  Get detailed reports about your Instagram followers, see who unfollowed you on Instagram, detect blockers, who is not following you back, see best stories and much more is possible now with iAssistant. Works 24/7 to serve you the best analysis.  Main Features  - Track new and lost followers - Track your unfollowers - Track Account Growth - Track Post and Story Engagements - Story analysis - Blockers detection - Find Who are your best Instagram friends - Instant notifications - Detailed reports - Who liked your post more? - Which of your friend not following you back?  More features coming soon, dont miss them!
